thread.title: The 10 best things to do in Corsica
thread.title_full: The 10 best things to do in Corsica

title: The 10 best things to do in Corsica
text:
The 10 best things to do in Corsica The 10 best things to do in Corsica FROM romantic beaches to mountain scenery and delicious food, Corsica has a lot to offer. PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 00:01, Sat, Jul 25, 2015 GETTY Hike through the mountains to the dramatic Piscia di Gallu waterfall 
1. Hike through the mountains to the dramatic Piscia di Gallu waterfall. See corsica.forhikers.com . 
2. Visit the stunning cliff-top settlement of Bonifacio. Visit bonifacio.fr . 
3. Enjoy an evening stroll (and perhaps an ice cream) in Porto-Vecchio’s Genovese Citadel. Visit ot-portovecchio.com . 
4. Hear the sound of the real Corsica at a concert of traditional polyphonic singing. See corsica-isula.com/music.htm . 
5. Take a boat trip to the Iles Lavezzi from Porto-Vecchio or Bonifacio. Visit spmbonifacio.com . GETTY Try Brocciu, a local white cheese 
6. Explore the prehistoric fort settlements of Casteddu d’Araggiu. 
7. Go snorkelling or diving in the incredibly clear water of the southern beaches. 
8. Try the little-known Corsican wines, particularly the crisp rosés (see domainedetorraccia.blogspot.co.uk ) and brocciu, the local white cheese. 
9. Saddle up and go horse riding – either on the beaches at dawn or up in the mountains. Visit gitechezpierrot.free.fr . 
10. Harness the afternoon breeze and go windsurfing or kite surfing off Bonifacio. See bonifacio-windsurf.com . Related articles
